name: The Last Job (DefinitelyNotScaryGames)
description:
"I worked with someone I met online. They would tip me off about good houses to sack. They knew everything. When the owners are out,  what's inside the place, where are the cameras, back doors or alarms. I never asked them for more."

What seemed like an easy job descends into something horrifying. Explore the mysterious house, that holds very dark secrets, in this first person horror experience.

Gameplay time may vary depending on players ability to solve the puzzle. Approximate time to finish the game is 30 min.

Minimal Requirements:
  • i3 6300
  • GTX 1060 3GB
  • 8GB RAM

alt + enter if your game starts in windowed mode

Warning: THIS GAME CONTAINS GORE AND DISTURBING IMAGES!                         

If you have any suggestions or questions, feel free to join DefinitelyNotScaryGames DISCORD  server :)
